item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-08-01
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• have figured out that the "new" version of gmail crashes both firefox & safari. very odd. #
  • Ah crap, came back to our apartment & the power's out. Is this one of those brown-out things? #
  • photo.jpg #
  • Risotto @ Bacco #
  • Jedi Mind Trick @ Cambridge brewing company #
  • Boneless buffalo wings @ Cambride brewing company #
  • Turkey BLT @ Cambridge brewing company #
  • Burger & fries @ Met Bar #
  • I'm at Picco (513 Tremont St, E Berkeley St, Boston). #
  • Petit Syrah @ Picco #
  • BLT Pizza @ Picco #
